I just realized that I clicked on a breakpoint for a non-existing class:

- create a class Test
- set a breakpoint in the class
- rename the class to MyTest
- in the breakpoint view you still have a breakpoint for the class Test
- if you doubleclick it, you get the exception

I am unable to reproduce this problem in the latest code. When I rename a type, 
its breakpoints are deleted. Please re-open if a problem in a more recent build 
(such as 20020411).
Works for me in M5, too.
